channel.title: Starting up a server again
channel.description:
Hey guys!
I am finally back for good. I have been wanting to start working on RSPS for a while now, but could never find the time. I have now though so I want to get back into it. There is a problem though, I don't remember much about programming and such for RSPS. So I am going to need your all's help with ideas.
I want to make a server that people would love to come and play on, but I haven't played in a long time so I don't know what is good anymore. There are some questions I would like to ask you all in order to get some info on what the server should be like. Also, if you all have any suggestions that aren't related to any of the questions please post them.
1. 508 or 317 or what?
2. Would you rather have PvP or working skills? or both?
3. What items are most important to have in the game?
4. Easy to level up? Medium? or Hard?
5. User shops or NPC shops?
6. Easy to make money or hard(have to work for it)?
7. Good NPC drops or average (to make it more rewarding to have a better item)?
8. What client & source should I use?
9. Anything else?
That is about it guys! Thanks for the help (if you commented) I really appreciate it, and hope to bring you all an amazing server!

item.title: Starting up a server again
item.dc:creator: @b_b0yz_4 b b0yz 4
item.description:
@b_b0yz_4 wrote:

[quote=“xxxtilllyxxx, post:2, topic:423189”]1. 508 or 317 or what? 317 is the easiest tbh.

  1. Would you rather have PvP or working skills? or both? Better to have PVP and re-write all the skils by YOURSELF.

  2. What items are most important to have in the game? Rares like AGS, Partyhat and things like silverlight are always nice.

  3. Easy to level up? Medium? or Hard? I prefer between medium and hard, if it’s too hard people will just go back to runescape. Too easy and it’s just a waste.

  4. User shops or NPC shops? NPC shops, if you’re just getting back I doubt you can make POS.

  5. Easy to make money or hard(have to work for it)? Medium to hard.

  6. Good NPC drops or average (to make it more rewarding to have a better item)? Little hard.

  7. What client & source should I use? Hyperion All Tha Way! Just a tip. It will get VERY hard at times. Just learn from you’re mistakes and you’ll be fine.

  8. Anything else? PLEASE DONT USE PI OR DELTA… WERE TRYING TO NOT GET PEOPLE TO USE THEM.[/quote]

Thanks dude! I was thinking about the same thing. I was also planning on writing the skills myself, but that seems pretty advanced so that will be last on my list haha.

Read full topic

item.title: Starting up a server again
item.dc:creator: @xxxtilllyxxx xxxtilllyxxx
item.description:
@xxxtilllyxxx wrote:

  1. 508 or 317 or what? 317 is the easiest tbh.

  2. Would you rather have PvP or working skills? or both? Better to have PVP and re-write all the skils by YOURSELF.

  3. What items are most important to have in the game? Rares like AGS, Partyhat and things like silverlight are always nice.

  4. Easy to level up? Medium? or Hard? I prefer between medium and hard, if it’s too hard people will just go back to runescape. Too easy and it’s just a waste.

  5. User shops or NPC shops? NPC shops, if you’re just getting back I doubt you can make POS.

  6. Easy to make money or hard(have to work for it)? Medium to hard.

  7. Good NPC drops or average (to make it more rewarding to have a better item)? Little hard.

  8. What client & source should I use? Hyperion All Tha Way! Just a tip. It will get VERY hard at times. Just learn from you’re mistakes and you’ll be fine.

  9. Anything else? PLEASE DONT USE PI OR DELTA… WERE TRYING TO NOT GET PEOPLE TO USE THEM.

Read full topic
